entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
